激活的卡片: {"cost":{"最高力量":40},"params":"$[]$","description":"$[]$","formula":"$[]$","disabled":"$store.state.system.features.mining.currentSubfeature !== 0 || store.state.cryolab.mining.激活的卡片 || store.state.mining.torchDepths.includes(parseInt(option))$","trigger":"${ store.commit('mining/addTorchDepth', parseInt(option)); }$"}

effect: $[{ name: '生命值', type: ' \cdot ', value: 1.5 }, { name: '腐败的灵魂增益', type: ' \cdot ', value: 1.2 }]$
$[{ name: '图书馆', type: '解锁', value: true }, { name: '多通道', type: '+', value: 2 }, { name: '金尘容量', type: '+', value: 1e4 }]$
$[{ name: '产出', type: ' \cdot ', value: 1.75 }, { name: '作物经验', type: ' \cdot ', value: 1.2 }, { name: '过度生长', type: '+', value: 0.2 }]$

激活的卡片: {"cost":{"最高力量":35},"params":"${ let increases = 0; let 硝 = 0; store.state.mining.breaks.forEach((amount, index) => { const highest = Math.max(...store.state.mining.breaks.slice(index)); if (highest > amount) { increases++; if (store.state.system.features.mining.currentSubfeature === 0 && index + 1 >= MINING_NITER_DEPTH) { let breaksMult = 0; let currentBreaks = amount; while (currentBreaks < highest) { const breaksBase = currentBreaks > 0 ? \\text{向下取整}(Math.log10(currentBreaks)) : -1; const nextStep = {(10)}^{breaksBase + 1}; currentBreaks = Math.min(highest, nextStep); if (currentBreaks === nextStep) { breaksMult++; } } 硝 += store.getters['mining/rareDropFinal']('硝')  \\cdot  breaksMult; } } }); return [increases, 硝]; }$","description":"$[]$","formula":"$[formatNum(params[1])]$","disabled":"$store.state.cryolab.mining.激活的卡片 || params[0] <= 0$","trigger":"${ let highest = 0; store.commit('mining/updateKey', { key: 'breaks', value: [...store.state.mining.breaks].reverse().map(el => { if (el > highest) { highest = el; } return highest; }).reverse() }); store.dispatch('currency/gain', { feature: 'mining', name: '硝', amount: params[1] }); }$"}
